pr_title: Added a field for kafka header timestamp in DatastreamProducerRecord

timeline.bodyText: Can you add a comment explaining this field comes from the Kafka header? Also my mistake, we probably shouldn't have the word "audit" in the name. How about renaming it to: _eventsKafkaHeaderTimestamp?
timeline.author: somandal

replies.bodyText: I was kind of reluctant to add the word audit here too. I guess you're right. Will try to rephrase everything in more generic terms.
replies.author: jzakaryan

timeline.bodyText:
nit: can you rephrase this:
Get saved Kafka header timestamp in Epoch-millis
or something along those lines?
timeline.author: somandal

timeline.bodyText:
nit: can you rephrase this:
Set the timestamp from the Kafka header in Epoch-millis
or something along those lines?
timeline.author: somandal
somandal
